newsitem.title: USA: BioSafe FY96 net loss widens with charges.
newsitem.headline: BioSafe FY96 net loss widens with charges.

text.p: BioSafe International Inc on Friday said its 1996 net loss widened to $13.9 million from a loss of $7.9 million the previous year.
It said revenues from landfill operations rose to $1,496,000 from $1,344,000. Net royalties from licensing its patented medical waste technology rose to $923,000 from $865,000.

The company said its 1996 loss reflected charges related to the company's restructuring after a management change in March 1996. The charges included $1,742,000 in restructuring expenses, $2,261,000 for discontinued operations, $834,000 in public relations consulting fees and a write-off of $6,652,000 in landfill development costs, primarily related to its remodeling project in Fairhaven, Massachusetts.
